law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 335, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 436, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Samples of exempted novelties to be approved by state fire marshal before sale -- Labeling.
